name: Squiggly: Kids Math Games
description:
Built by students and teachers, Squiggly is an open-world 3D adventure game that teaches counting, adding up to 2 digits, and subtracting up to 2 digits. Choose between 5 learning levels across 4 unique worlds: Island Hero, Castle Hero, Space Hero, and Ninja Hero. Whether it’s harvesting pineapples to feed to the hungry orcas or delivering zero-gravity space pizza to the astronaut party, Squiggly is sure to create lasting memories and teach valuable early math skills.

In the Squigglyverse, you choose who you are, how you learn, and where you want to go. We founded Squiggly to create a virtual learning environment where all students can play, explore, and discover on their own terms.

From the creators of Redwood AR, the world’s 1st augmented reality math adventure game, Squiggly stands as the next evolution of game-based learning. To learn more about our mission to accelerate the pace of human learning & play Squiggly Math on web, visit squiggly.school 

We are constantly trying to make our games more fun and educational and could use your help. Please reach out to info@squiggly.school with any feedback, suggestions, questions, concerns, or ideas you and your learners have.

Squiggly Math features 4 ad-free, kid-approved learning games:

1. Island Hero

2. Castle Hero

3. Space Hero

4. Ninja Hero

What do you learn in Squiggly Math?

- Counting to 25

- Single-digit addition

- Double-digit addition

- Single-digit subtraction

- Double-digit subtraction

How to play Squiggly Math:

1. Create a free Squiggly Math account or play as guest

2. Choose a minigame to explore

3. Choose your learning level / difficulty

4. Pick your avatar!

5. Collect objects around the in-game world (pineapples, apples, pizza, or carrots)

6. Throw the objects to the destination (orca whales, horses, astronauts, or rabbits) to answer the question

7. Tap the check box on the bottom center when you answered correctly

Privacy policy: https://redwood-learning.com/user-privacy/

 

Your family’s privacy is extremely important to us. We do not collect individually-identifiable information and anonymize all the data we do collect. We will never sell data to third parties and will never show targeted ads.

 

We are committed to remaining 100% ad-free.
